comment: I will no longer be working for Gab and serving as Gabs CTO. The attacks from the American press have been relentless for two years now and have taken a toll on me personally. I wish Gab nothing but the best and will do everything I can to help them transition to a new CTO.
amr:
# ::snt I will no longer be working for Gab and serving as Gabs CTO. The attacks from the American press have been relentless for two years now and have taken a toll on me personally. I wish Gab nothing but the best and will do everything I can to help them transition to a new CTO.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (w / work-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG2 (p / product
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Gab"))
                  :time (n2 / no-longer))
            :op2 (s / serve-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 p
                        :ARG2 (o / officer
                              :mod (c / chief)
                              :mod (e / executive)))))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (r / relentless
                  :domain (a3 / attack-01
                        :ARG0 (p2 / press
                              :mod (c2 / country
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "America"))))
                  :duration (t / temporal-quantity
                        :quant 2
                        :unit (y / year)))
            :op2 (t2 / take-10
                  :ARG0 a3
                  :ARG1 (t3 / toll-02
                        :ARG0 a3
                        :ARG1 (ii2 / i)
                        :ARG1-of (p3 / personal-02)))
            :snt3 (w2 / wish-01
                  :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
                  :ARG1 (a4 / and
                        :op1 (g / good-02
                              :ARG1 ii3
                              :mod (n4 / nothing-but)
                              :ARG2-of (h2 / have-degree-91
                                    :ARG1 ii3
                                    :ARG3 (m2 / most)))
                        :op2 (d / do-02
                              :ARG0 ii3
                              :ARG1 (e2 / everything
                                    :ARG1-of (p4 / possible-01))
                              :ARG2 (h3 / help-01
                                    :ARG0 ii3
                                    :ARG1 (t4 / transition-01
                                          :ARG0 (t5 / they)
                                          :ARG2 (o2 / organization
                                                :ARG1-of (n5 / new-01)
                                                :ARG0-of (h4 / have-org-role-91
                                                      :ARG2 c)
                                                :ARG3 (c3 / conspire-01))))
                              :ARG2 t5)))))

comment: Please watch your language and use more amiable words.
amr:
# ::snt Please watch your language and use more amiable words.
(a / and
      :op1 (w / watch-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (l / language
                  :poss y))
      :op2 (u / use-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (w2 / word
                  :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                        :ARG2 (a2 / amiable)
                        :ARG3 (m / more)))))

comment: Good luck on your future endeavors. Hopefully your new job makes your happier.
amr:
# ::snt Good luck on your future endeavors. Hopefully your new job makes your happier.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (l / luck
            :ARG1-of (g / good-02)
            :topic (e / endeavor-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :time (f / future)))
      :snt2 (h / hope-01
            :ARG1 (m2 / make-02
                  :ARG0 (j / job
                        :ARG1-of (n / new-01)
                        :poss (y2 / you))
                  :ARG1 (h2 / happy-01
                        :ARG1 y2
                        :ARG2-of (h3 / have-degree-91
                              :ARG1 y2
                              :ARG3 (m3 / more))))))
